I’m 46 bust and never try to button shirts/sweaters/blouses and this one will be worn open as well. I haven’t washed it yet but don’t expect any issues.

I was honestly surprised I received this cardigan and couldn't believe it came from amazon. The bright white is a great bright white (almost an icy blueish white) and the navy and pink were also really great saturated colors. The hardest part has been choosing which to keep.
Not a shrug, not a longer cardigan-type sweater—it's a classy length and the perfect weight for a summer sleeveless dress.

I do love the design in the weave and the wavy trim. It’s well made. I bought a large. For reference, I am 5’3” and 148 lbs.

This is a great cardigan for warmer days. It is pretty, lightweight, fits well, and can be used for dressier or more casual outfits. It seems to be well made and washes well.

I really like this KATE KASIN shrug in white! It's perfect for the warmer weather ahead, lightweight and soft to the touch. While it's true to size and as pictured, I think going one size bigger would have made me even more comfortable. It's very pretty and practical and perfect with spring dresses or over tank tops and jeans.

评论概述: Overall good quality sweater that is true to the online photos
评论详情: I wanted a lightweight cardigan sweater to wear over my sleeveless or short sleeve summer dresses on cool summer nights, so I ordered this one, and it is going to work out just fine. I am 5’6 and weigh 185 pounds and I ordered my regular size large and it fits just like I wanted and expected it to fit. Per the tag inside, this cardigan sweater is a blend of viscose and polyester, and can be washed separately, but should NOT be tumble dried. The sweater also has a nice quality feel to it, that feels good on the body. Thumbs up on this cardigan sweater.

I'm " fluffy". I have thick upper arms . Frankly, it's so hard to find anything that has room for ...okay, let's face it...fat arms. I'm adding pictures of me wearing the sweater, and as you see, it fits nicely , including over my arms. It's lightweight, but it does not look cheap. The front of the sweater has a floral weave that is really pretty. The buttons are sturdily sewn and though plain, look very nice. I won't have to replace them. Now I can grab a few budget sleeveless summer dresses, and by adding this nice sweater, I can go from casual to dressy. I really, really love it.

This little shrug is a gorgeous addition to any wardrobe. The crochet style texture on the front and arms is a lovely floral pattern. The neck, sleeves and hem have a beautiful scalloped finished. It just all comes together to make a very pretty and versatile shrug. You can easily pair it with shorts, jeans, skirt & blouse or a dress to elevate your outfit up a level. I did order up a size and fit is perfect.

评论概述: Very nice shrug for Spring & Summer!
评论详情: Absolutely adore this KATE KASIN shrug, perfect for the warmer weather coming up. It's lightweight and will be great at taking away a slight chill. I got the white and it's a nice creamy color that looks rich.  For sizing, I did order up (L) on purpose, as I wanted a looser fit, as you can see in pics. The M would have of probably been fine, too-depends on the look you want. For reference, I have a 37.5" bust measurement with 30" waist.  I've worn this with jeans, but can't wait to wear with a dress. Great for Easter coming up! Very very nice!

I am very happy with this cardigan!  It is a beautiful style and very soft and comfortable.  I really appreciate a "crop" style, as on me, it then hits at about the waist!  The top is nicely sewn and has a lot of detail between the scalloped edges and lace.  The size chart is accurate.  However, I noted that the XXL bust is between 44" and 47" inch.  My 47" bust fits comfortably but at times creates a gap between the buttons; otherwise, it is nicely form fitting.  All in all, it is a wonderful item and a great addition to any wardrobe for those dresses and tops that need a little overlay!
This sweater looks very stylish and comfortable to wear. The size fits perfectly.
